caption:
Ever wish you could just ask the tough questions about divorce and money - without feeling judged or overwhelmed?

Here’s the truth no one tells you:

Divorce doesn’t come with a roadmap... and money doesn’t magically behave itself just because you need it to.

That’s exactly why Divorce Unscripted exists.

No scripts. No shame. Just real talk with real experts - and real answers you can actually use.

On May 13th, we’re going virtual to bring you conversations that calm your nervous system, clear your mind, and boost your confidence for the road ahead.

• If you’ve been carrying around questions (or guilt, or fear) about your finances post-divorce, this space is for you.

→ If you’re craving honest, supportive guidance instead of “one-size-fits-all” advice, this space is for you.

• If you’re ready to feel strong, capable, and excited about what’s next — this space is for you.

Bring your coffee. Bring your notebook. Bring your messy, beautiful self.

LINK BIO 💕

#estateplanning #divorce #unscripted
